author: andschwa

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I can no longer reach the server... investigating.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: The service account that the Jenkins service was running under has either had its password changed or its been deleted. Either way I have no access to said account any more now, so I've moved the service under my account as a stopgap. This will of course break again in ... 9 days when my own password expires.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: The Jenkins instance is now back online.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: The slave is now back online.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I've updated the SCM configuration to clone both PowerShell and psl-omi-provider recursively using the PowerShell CI user and its token.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I've removed the old version of `dotnet` from the system and updated the build script to more closely match Travis CI.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I've modified the job to delete the workspace before it starts since we can't use `git clean -fdx` with its version of Git (due to the bug with submodules).

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Dealing with an errant bug in the Clear-Variable tests.

title: Update Jenkins for shuffling of PSRP
